item.title: Using the FileReader API in async functions
item.description: The FileReader API allows you to read files from the users’ computer. Due to sandboxing of course this is mostly limited to files the user has selected in the file input fields. The most interesting functionality is probably the .readAsArrayBuffer() function as it allows you to selectively read the file and only store part of it in memory. This allows client-side applications to process huge files without the need for huge memory.
